snippet: The statements underscored China’s caution on taking further action against North Korea despite its third nuclear test.
abstract: China says that United States decision to strengthen antimissile defenses in response to threats from North Korea risks deepening regional tensions.
lead_paragraph: The statements underscored China’s caution on taking further action against North Korea despite its third nuclear test.

headline.seo: China Cites Risk of Tension as U.S. Bolsters Missile Defenses
headline.main: China Cites Risk of New Tension as U.S. Bolsters Missile Defenses
headline.print_headline:
China: Beijing Says U.S. Response
To North Korea Increases Tensions

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
